titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for prising of wines.
Proclamations. 1678-01-12.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills, printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Given at our Court at Witehall the twelfth day of January 1677/8. In the nine and twentieth year of our reign. God save the King.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
